程序包 cst8284.triviatime

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Controls
    contains static methods related mostly to the menus, as well as the "Next Question" button that appears in the bottom right corner of the display when the questions are loaded.
    FileUtils
    This class is to retrieve the file that contains the trivia question/answer information.
    QA
    This class defines the format of the question/answer in the trivia file.
    QAPane
    This class defines the pane of question and answers to be shown onto the center of the root pane.
    QARequirements
    This class is the superclass of QA class, which defines the format of the question/answer in the trivia file.
    Results
    This class is to store the result of the trivia game.
    TriviaTimeLaunch
    This class is to display the trivia game onto a scene.
